title: Laurel & Hardy: Wrong again. Angora love. They go boom
creator_credit: James Parrott, Lewis R. Foster, Leo McCarey and Hal Roach
brief_description: Three classic comic shorts from Laurel and Hardy. In “Wrong again” (20 mins. 1929), a comedy with a surrealistic edge, stable-hands Stan and Ollie respond to a millionaire’s offer of a reward for ‘Blue Boy’, a missing painting, by delivering ‘Blue Boy’ a horse. They find an instruction to leave ‘Blue Boy’ on the piano. In “Angora love” (20 mins. 1929) Stan and Ollie are adopted by a runaway goat. In “They go boom” (20 mins. 1927) the boys try to cure Stan’s mysterious illness and throw the landlord into distress when the cure escalates into a disaster.
